On the tech struggle bus? Join me & Mani O'Brien on Digital Dames's FB Live today at 12:30 pm PST for our first Lunch & Learn Live to answer your questions about digital marketing and technology to market and manage your business.
– How to think about strategically about digital tech for your business
– A 4-step plan for choosing the right technology for your business

I was considering Uber as a side gig....but then I realized

I can't drive for crap. It's amazing I even have my license still. On top of that, my car is literally falling apart from the last accident and it's only a 2011. Nobody would pay to get in that car with me. In fact, I Uber half the time because I don't trust myself.

So throw some ideas at me. I don't like having wasted time and I'm curious what others out there have going on that isn't too demanding and doesn't interfere with their full time job, but still generates additional income.
What's working, folks? And what should we stay away from?

I participated in two research projects while at ASU.  The first being field research in the country of Ecuador.  I studied the sexual health practices of the Quichua people there in Ecuador.  We compared chemical compounds found in their medicines to the ones that we use in western culture.My other research project involved mathematical modeling of the melting of icebergs in the arctic due to global warming.

Incredibly adaptable, fluent with both people and machines.Expertise and Skill Sets:• Mobile, Tablet & Responsive Design Platforms• e-Commerce• SaaS (Cloud-based Multi Tenancy UX)• Data Analytics• IoT UX (PLC/OPC)• UX Strategy and Implementation• Wireframe Creation• Interaction Design• Information Architecture• User Testing and Research• Product Design• Visual Design• Interactive Prototyping• Enterprise Applications• Agile Development• Lean UX Awards: Winner of HP's Living Progress Challenge - 2016Featured Graduate Student Of the Year ASU - 2014ASU's top community engineering mentor - 2012
